data: It has been told that there was once a young man of free kindred and whose name was Hallblithe: he was fair, strong, and not untried in battle; he was of the House of the Raven of old time.

The Story of the Glittering Plain
Which Has Been Also Called the Land of Living Men or the Acre of the Undying
